title: 103_hr4290
content: Bosnia and Herzegovina Self-Defense Act of 1994 - Directs the President to terminate the US arms embargo of the Government of Bosnia and Herzegovina upon receipt of a request from such government for assistance in exercising its right of self-defense under the United Nations Charter. Authorizes the President to direct the drawdown of defense articles and services and military education and training to provide assistance to Bosnia and Herzegovina if it makes such request. Limits the amount of such assistance. Bars members of the US armed forces who provide such assistance from performing combatant duties outside of the United States. Authorizes appropriations.
